summary: A Union Captain and his troops guard a load of gold from a group of Confederates at the end of the war
cast: Grant Williams|Brad Dexter|Carole Mathews|Robert Dix|Richard Garland|Richard Crane|Rayford Barnes|Rex Holman|John Erwin|Boyd Holister|Mauritz Hugo|Richard Monahan|Ted Knight|Fred Kohler Jr.|Stephen Ferry|I. Stanford Jolley|Walter Reed|John Frederick|Mark Hickman|Ford Dunhill|Brad Harris|Earl Holmes|Richard Jeffries|Jerry Mobley|Roger Browne
title: 13 Fighting Men
